summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $300.00 out of the General Fund of the City of Seattle, to settle the suit of Benjamin J. Angelles and Louisa Angelles, his wife, plaintiffs against the City of Seattle, et al, defendants, claiming damages to lots 1 and 2, block 19, lots 11 and 12, block 17, and lots 10, 11 and 12, block 18, Aberfeldy Estate Addition to the City of Seattle, King County State of Washington, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
